item.title: 世界高級自動車会社のインターン
item.description: 引用元 https://progres11.jposting.net/pgbmw/u/job.phtml?job_code=163 企業名 BMW 職務内容 BMW Group Japan is providing several options for your internship experience. The areas of the programme are in Marketing, Sales planning, finance, Engineering etc. Job description Current openings : 1)Engineering ( 2017 Oct - 2018 March ) ASAP 2)Marketing (2017 Dec - 2018 May) 3)Back Office (2018 Jan -2018 Jun) 登録資格 Required soft skills: be
